settings.Name: Flood
settings.Description:
[color="red"]IMPORTANT NOTE: AI PLAYERS DON'T WORK WITH RISING WATER[/color]

A great flood moves across the valley. At some point you have to evacuate your units and use ships to reach the mainland and the other players.

WaterLevels.Name: Rising
WaterLevels.Description: The water rises. The homeislands will become uninhabitable.

WaterLevels.Name: Shallow
WaterLevels.Description: The water doesn't rise. Ships and troops can battle in chest deep waters.

WaterLevels.Name: Deep
WaterLevels.Description: The water doesn't rise. You have to use ships to travel to the mainland.
